Type

type
class
The haXe Reflection API enables you to retreive informations about any value, Classes and Enums at runtime.

Static Methods

allEnums<T>( e : Enum<allEnums.T> ) : Array<allEnums.T>

Returns the list of all enum values that don't take any parameter.

createEmptyInstance<T>( cl : Class<createEmptyInstance.T> ) : createEmptyInstance.T

Similar to Reflect.createInstance excepts that the constructor is not called. This enables you to create an instance without any side-effect.

createEnum<T>( e : Enum<createEnum.T>, constr : String, ?params : Array<Dynamic> ) : createEnum.T

Create an instance of an enum by using a constructor name and parameters.

createEnumIndex<T>( e : Enum<createEnumIndex.T>, index : Int, ?params : Array<Dynamic> ) : createEnumIndex.T

Create an instance of an enum by using a constructor index and parameters.

createInstance<T>( cl : Class<createInstance.T>, args : Array<Dynamic> ) : createInstance.T

Creates an instance of the given class with the list of constructor arguments.

enumConstructor( e : EnumValue ) : String

Returns the constructor of an enum

enumEq<T>( a : enumEq.T, b : enumEq.T ) : Bool

Recursively compare two enums constructors and parameters.

enumIndex( e : EnumValue ) : Int

Returns the index of the constructor of an enum

enumParameters( e : EnumValue ) : Array<Dynamic>

Returns the parameters of an enum

getClass<T>( o : getClass.T ) : Class<getClass.T>

Returns the class of a value or null if this value is not a Class instance.

getClassFields( c : Class<Dynamic> ) : Array<String>

Returns the list of a class static fields.

getClassName( c : Class<Dynamic> ) : String

Returns the complete name of a class.

getEnum( o : EnumValue ) : Enum<Dynamic>

Returns the enum of a value or null if this value is not an Enum instance.

getEnumConstructs( e : Enum<Dynamic> ) : Array<String>

Returns all the available constructor names for an enum.

getEnumName( e : Enum<Dynamic> ) : String

Returns the complete name of an enum.

getInstanceFields( c : Class<Dynamic> ) : Array<String>

Returns the list of instance fields.

getSuperClass( c : Class<Dynamic> ) : Class<Dynamic>

Returns the super-class of a class, or null if no super class.

resolveClass( name : String ) : Class<Dynamic>

Evaluates a class from a name. The class must have been compiled to be accessible.

resolveEnum( name : String ) : Enum<Dynamic>

Evaluates an enum from a name. The enum must have been compiled to be accessible.

typeof( v : Dynamic ) : ValueType

Returns the runtime type of a value.
